entry.title: Design inspiration - ffffound.com
entry.content: Love how their browsing interface is image based. It pivots on user and image, but always pushes you to the next image.

entry.title: Our App is in the App Store!
entry.content:
A major piece of the puzzle slots in. Our iPhone App is available. Get it on here.

We're phenomenally proud of what we're launching and incredibly excited by what it makes possible.

The months ahead promise to be busy for us. We'll be rolling out some great new features (for sale button, browse by location, public profiles, lost property). Follow our progress here and on twitter
